Hero.title: Streamline Your Business with OctoBook
Hero.subtitle: Analytics, smart reservations, staff management, and automated notifications all in one robust platform.

About.title: Everything you need to grow
About.subtitle: A complete suite of tools built specifically for appointment-based businesses.

analytics.title: Deep Analytics
analytics.desc: Track your growth, revenue, and customer retention all in one dashboard.

reservation.title: Smart Reservations
reservation.desc: Let customers book 24/7 with zero double-bookings or conflicts.

staff.title: Staff Management
staff.desc: Manage schedules, working hours, and commissions for your entire team.

categories.title: Categories & Services
categories.desc: Organize your offerings so clients find exactly what they need instantly.

calendars.title: Interactive Calendars
calendars.desc: Drag-and-drop calendar interfaces for seamless workflow.

notifications.title: Email & Mobile Notifications
notifications.desc: Automated reminders ensure clients never miss an appointment again.

UseCases.title: Built for every appointment business
UseCases.subtitle: Discover how OctoBook adapts to your specific needs.

salons.title: Salons & Spas
salons.desc: Manage multiple stylists, equipment, and variable time slots effortlessly.

clinics.title: Clinics & Health
clinics.desc: Secure patient booking with custom intake forms and automated reminders.

gyms.title: Gyms & Fitness
gyms.desc: Class scheduling, capacity management, and automatic waitlists.

studios.title: Photography & Studios
studios.desc: Book sessions, require deposits, and sync with your personal calendar.

Pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
Pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees. Scale as your business grows.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about OctoBook.

q1.question: Can I integrate OctoBook with Google Calendar?
q1.answer: Yes! We offer two-way sync with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Apple Calendar.

q2.question: Is there a limit on how many staff members I can add?
q2.answer: Starter plans include 1 staff member, Professional plans support up to 5, and Enterprise allows unlimited staff.

q3.question: Can I customize the booking page to match my brand?
q3.answer: Absolutely. You can add your logo, brand colors, and custom imagery to the booking page.

q4.question: Do you offer customer support if I run into issues?
q4.answer: Yes, all plans include support. Pro and Enterprise plans include priority text and email support.

Demo.title: Book an Appointment
